issue.title: Adding DS definition
issue.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

DS definition is missing inside EasySDI installers and EasySDI extensions for Joomla.
Have to add @define( 'DS', DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR );@ everywhere needed inside source code...

Should also prepare Joomla 3.x compliance with same code than 2.5!

**Fixed versions :** 3.1.0
